Texts.Chs: 如果你有一堆松散的砂粒材料，比如^orange;泥沙^reset;, ^orange;砾石^reset;或者^green;其他粉状材料^reset;，可以直接把它们扔进^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;，这样就能从中提取资源！可以的时候记得建造一台^orange;木制筛粉机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: If you have stacks of loose grit like ^orange;silt^reset;, ^orange;Gravel^reset; or ^green;other powdery materials^reset; then just toss them in a ^orange;Sifter^reset; and you can pull resources right out of them! Build a ^orange;Sifter^reset; when you can do so.

Texts.Chs: 在^cyan;电子设备制造机^reset;处制造一台^orange;木制筛粉机^orange;
Texts.Eng: Make a ^green;Wooden Sifter^reset; at your ^orange;Electronics Center^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 筛粉机十分磨叽，所以我建议尽快在电子设备制造中心将其升级为^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Sifters are terribly inefficient and slow, so as soon as you can I advise upgrading to a ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; at an Electronics Center.
